title: Ribbon, ca. 1919
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: warp printed on plain compound satin
creditline: Anonymous bequest in memory of Albert and Rebecca Elsberg
description: Broad ribbon with a woven gold design of conventionalized chrysanthemums. Chiné printed with multi-colored floral forms. Both selvages present on all samples.

tombstone.epitaph:

ca. 1919. Medium: silk, metallic thread
